short_description: Cotton

Premium Cotton Blend Drop Cloth: Safeguard your surfaces with our high-quality cotton blend drop cloths, sized at 6' x 9'. These clothes are ideal for catching paint splashes, dust, and spills during home projects. Whether you're covering furniture, floors, or walls, they make post-project cleanup quick and simple. Crafted with double-stitched hems and reinforced seams, each cloth is designed to withstand wear and tear, offering lasting reliability.

Durable and Reusable Canvas Fabric: Made for repeated use, our canvas drop cloths feature strong stitching that helps prevent fraying and tearing. The fabric is odor-free and easy to wash, making it a dependable choice for ongoing projects—painting, renovating, or working on crafts.

Highly Absorbent Construction: The tightly woven structure of our canvas provides excellent absorbency, which is ideal for catching drips and spills. Reinforced edges and double-stitched seams reduce the risk of unraveling over time. Constructed with quality materials, the thick canvas ensures durability and helps minimize seepage during use.

Versatile and Sustainable: A smart alternative to disposable plastic sheets, our cotton drop cloths are reusable and more budget-friendly over time. Great for a wide range of tasks—from shielding surfaces during painting to helping with household projects—these cloths offer dependable performance again and again.

Perfect for Outdoor Use: Lightweight and easy to fold, our drop cloths are convenient to bring along for outdoor projects. Whether painting outside or working on creative setups, you can keep your surroundings cleaner and stay focused on the task at hand.

name: 8 oz Canvas Safety Drop Cloth, 3.5' x 12'
short_description: 100% Canvas
Imported
SAFETY DROP CLOTH: The ingenious CoverGrip Safety Drop Cloth simply and elegantly provides protection, not just to the surfaces in our homes, but also for the people who work and live in them.
INNOVATIVE SLIP-RESISTANT DOTS: Thousands of tiny, rubberized dots firmly attached to the bottom of each protective cloth. Once pressure is applied, the rubber dots grab and hold firm.
CONVENIENT: Folds perfectly and conforms to surfaces. Fits snugly on stairs, into corners or anywhere it’s needed. Once positioned, the cloth holds its fold to stay in place.
PURPOSEFUL: Make your work place safer and reduce accidents while working on wood, title, concrete, metal, and many more surfaces. Ideal for painters, wood workers, plumbers, movers, custodians, etc.
SPECIFICS: (1) CoverGrip 8 oz Safety Drop Cloth. Size: 3.5’ x 12’. Made of high-quality cotton-poly canvas. Machine washable. Also available in a variety of sizes and weights.
product_description: CoverGrip Safety Drop Cloth, a traditional 8-ounce drop cloth with a pattern of slip resistant dots on the back side. The material is to lie flat conforming to most surfaces and remain in place when people or equipment are working on it. This product resists spills and performs all the functions of a traditional drop cloth with the addition of safety. The ingenious CoverGrip drop cloth simply and elegantly provides protection, not just to the beautiful surfaces in our homes, but also for the people who work and live in them. The dots are the difference. CoverGrip drop cloths are manufactured with thousands of tiny, rubberized dots firmly attached to the bottom of each protective cloth. Once pressure is applied, the rubber dots grab and hold firm. The dots are slightly rounded which allows them to effectively increase grip even when under a shifting load. The rows of dots also enable CoverGrip drop cloths to easily fold and conform to surfaces. The cloths fold perfectly -right on the dotted lines, to fit snugly on stairs, into corners or anywhere they're needed. Once positioned, they "hold their fold" to stay in place; no more inadvertently exposed surfaces! You can easily move the cloth around to reposition it whenever you want, but when they're under a load you can't make them budge. Make your work place safer and reduce accidents while working on wood, title, concrete, metal, marble, granite, and many more surfaces. Ideal for painters, electricians, wood workers, plumbers, movers, custodians, etc. Finally when you're done, just pick up your CoverGrip cloth and put it away. The cotton-poly canvas is machine washable (the dots won't fall off) and easily folds up. The CoverGrip drop cloths are available in a variety of sizes and weights.
